email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out with a freight offer for 15,000MT of Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Elena Rodriguez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Elena Rodriguez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Elena Rodriguez
Global Freight
